item.description:
Spring is here and so is softball season.

NHC will be playing in the East Haven COED Softball League.

Games are Thursday Evening at 6,7,or 8pm in East Haven. Season starts approximately the 1st or 2nd week in May and lasting about 12 weeks.

In response to our relatively mediocre team performance last season, we are holding mandatory tryouts dates for everyone who would like to play on this spring's team. (you don't have to attend every tryout date)

It is my intention to have a more competitive team this season.

If you have any questions, suggestions or cannot attend but would like to, please contact me.

Thanks,

Doug
Team Organizer
item.name: NHC COED SOFTBALL TEAM TRYOUTS/PRACTICE
